issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Clean up unused collection methods in various APIs

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: YARN-441 is removing some collection APIs that are utility methods on top the base APIs. MR App needs to be updated to not use those anymore.

comments.body: MR related changes from Xuan's latest patch at YARN-441. Already reviewed.
Committed the latest patch to trunk and branch-2 along with YARN-441. Closing this as resolved.

Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #3633 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/3633/])
    YARN-441. Removed unused utility methods for collections from two API records. Contributed by Xuan Gong.
MAPREDUCE-5163. Update MR App to not use API utility methods for collections after YARN-441. Contributed by Xuan Gong. (Revision 1469657)

     Result = SUCCESS
vinodkv : http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/?root=Apache-SVN&view=rev&rev=1469657
